R

registerKill(Entity) - Method in class com.model.entity.Entity
Registers killing off an entity.
registerKill(Entity) - Method in class com.model.entity.pc.Player
Registers killing off a target.
restoreHealth(BigInteger, Entity) - Method in class com.model.entity.GameCharacter
Restores the given amount of health.
restoreMana(BigInteger, Entity) - Method in class com.model.entity.GameCharacter
Restores the given amount of mana.
Room - Class in com.model.layout
A representation of a room in the game.
Room() - Constructor for class com.model.layout.Room
Constructs a new empty room with no special effects.
Room(GUI) - Constructor for class com.model.layout.Room
Creates a new room that will be notified by the given GUI.
roomDiscovered(Direction, Dimension) - Method in class com.model.layout.FloorLayout
Returns true if the room in the specified direction next to the room at the passed location both exists and has been discovered, else false.
roomEntered(Direction, Dimension) - Method in class com.model.layout.FloorLayout
Returns true if the room in the specified direction next to the room at the passed location both exists and has been entered, else false.
roomExists(Direction) - Method in class com.model.layout.FloorLayout
Returns true if there is a room in the selected direction next to the room currently inhabited by the player, or otherwise false.
roomExists(Direction, Dimension) - Method in class com.model.layout.FloorLayout
Returns true if there is a room in the selected direction next to the room at the passed location, or otherwise false.
run() - Method in class com.view.GUI
Initialises the UI, setting up all of the frames and sub panels.
